API_SPEC_V1.title: API Spec
API_SPEC_V1.body:
# API Spec: {service_or_feature}

## Overview
- Auth: {auth_type}
- Base URL: {base_url}
- Version: {version}

## Endpoints
### {METHOD} {PATH}
**Purpose**: 

**Request**
- Headers:
  - Authorization: 
- Query:
```json
{}
```
- Body:
```json
{}
```

**Response 200**
```json
{}
```

**Errors**
- 400: 
- 401: 
- 403: 
- 404: 
- 429: 
- 500: 

## Conventions
- Error shape:
```json
{"error":{"code":"","message":"","details":{}}}
```
- Pagination:
```json
{"items":[],"next_cursor":null}
```

DB_TABLE_V1.title: DB Table Spec
DB_TABLE_V1.body:
# Table: {table_name}

## Purpose
- 

## Columns
| Column | Type | Nullable | Default | Notes |
|---|---|---:|---|---|
| id | uuid | no | gen_random_uuid() | PK |

## Indexes
- 

## RLS Policy Notes (Supabase)
- Select: owner-only
- Insert: owner-only
- Update: owner-only
- Delete: owner-only

## Example Queries

```sql
-- 
```

QA_GWT_V1.title: QA Test Cases (GWT)
QA_GWT_V1.body:
# QA: {feature_name}

## Checklist
- [ ] Empty state
- [ ] Loading state
- [ ] Error state
- [ ] Permission / RLS
- [ ] Rate limit
- [ ] Duplicate / idempotency
- [ ] Localization (if any)

## Test Cases (Given-When-Then)
1) **[P0]** Given {condition}, When {action}, Then {expected}
2) **[P1]** Given , When , Then 

## Edge Cases
- 

## Risk Notes
-
